name: Haus Of Klaus
summary: It's payback time for Klaus Von Klensch, mastermind of the apocalypse! Sneak or fight your way through his bunker to the reactor core... Trigger a meltdown... then get the hell out before it all goes boom! Should take a tough guy like YOU about ten minutes, right? With only a handful of items (Plasma Pistol, EMP grenades, Locator, Adrenochrome Booster, and of course Toilet Brush) you'll need serious attitude to succeed in your mission of vengeance. Stealthy, shooty, sweary, oldskool arcade action in a...
